source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: iOS 12 Swift 4.2 - The Complete iOS App Development Bootcamp
items.headline: From Beginner to iOS App Developer with Just One Course!
objectives_summary: Be able to build any app you want
Start your own app based business
Create a portfolio of apps to apply for junior developer jobs at a technology company

items.title: Kotlin Coroutines for Android Masterclass
items.headline: Learn Kotlin Coroutines in depth and practice advanced Coroutines use cases in Android application
objectives_summary: Use Kotlin Coroutines to implement the most common flows in Android applications
Learn the best practices of software design with Coroutines
Understand Coroutines cancellation and error handling in details

items.title: iOS 12 Chat Application like WhatsApp and Viber
items.headline: iOS12, swift 4.2, xCode 10, whats app, chat, messenger, push notification, call, social media, ios development
objectives_summary: the course will cover many topic of iOS development.
By the end pf this course you will have your own copy of whatsapp with all the functionalities

items.title: iOS 8 and Swift - How to Make a "Freaking" iPhone App

visible_instructors.name: Nick
visible_instructors.job_title: Mobile and Web Developer - iOS, Android, Django, Python. etc
visible_instructors.title: Nick Walter

items.headline: Using Xcode and Swift, learn how to develop real world iOS apps for the App Store. No programming experience required!
objectives_summary: You will have apps you created in the App Store
You will make apps that use GPS, the camera and the microphone
You will make a social networking app

items.title: Jetpack Compose Crash course for Android with Kotlin
items.headline: Modern Android apps with Jetpack Compose and  integrations: MVVM, Coroutines, ViewModel, LiveData, Retrofit, Navigation
objectives_summary: How to create Android UI and layouts directly in code with Kotlin
Modern Declarative way of creating UI in Android
How to use Compose with other Jetpack libraries: ViewModel, Navigation, LiveData

items.title: Clean architecture & SOLID principles for Android in Kotlin
items.headline: Learn to implement Clean architecture in Android using SOLID principles and MVVM
objectives_summary: Clean architecture
SOLID principles
MVVM

items.title: Apple TV App & Game Development for tvOS
items.headline: Everything you need to know to build apps and games for the Apple TV on tvOS including TVML, Swift, and SpriteKit
objectives_summary: Build native Apple TV apps
Build Apple TV TVML apps (Client-server Apps)
Build Apple TV Games for tvOS

items.title: Modern Food Recipes App - Android Development with Kotlin
items.headline: Develop beautiful and fully functional Android App in Android Studio using the power of Kotlin programming language.
objectives_summary: Develop a fully functional Android App
Food Recipes Android app
ROOM Database

items.title: Introduction to iOS Game Development with SpriteKit & Swift
items.headline: Develop your first iOS game using the SpriteKit framework and Swift. A Jump'N'Run with countless awesome features!
objectives_summary: Thoroughly understand the SpriteKit framework
Learn about different Node classes
Learn about SKPhysics & SKActions

items.title: Ionic Apps with Firebase
items.headline: Build a Server-less Social App with Ionic and Firebase for Android and iOS from scratch to store.
objectives_summary: Build Android and iOS Apps with Ionic
Using Ionic Native Plugins for native features like Camera
Use Firebase with Ionic and Angular apps

items.title: Reactive Programming in iOS with RxSwift

visible_instructors.name: Scott
visible_instructors.job_title: iOS App Architect/Developer, Consultant, Author, and Speaker
visible_instructors.title: Scott Gardner

items.headline: Learn how to use Reactive Extensions for Swift and Cocoa Touch
objectives_summary: Understand the fundamentals of reactive programming and reactive extensions
Use marble diagrams to explore RxSwift operators
Create and subscribe to observable sequences

items.title: Xamarin Android: Learn to Build Native Android Apps With C#

visible_instructors.name: Uchenna
visible_instructors.job_title: Senior Software Engineer and Lead Instructor
visible_instructors.title: Uchenna Nnodim

items.headline: Become a Xamarin Pro Android Developer with C#. Includes Quiz App, Social App, Maps App, Firebase. Build Real World Apps
objectives_summary: Learn to build full fledge Native Android Apps using Xamarin and C#
Learn to create beautiful User Interface Design for your Android Apps
Learn the  basics of App Design and Prototyping using Adobe XD

items.title: Xamarin Android - A Master Guide to App Development in C#

visible_instructors.name: Grant
visible_instructors.job_title: Former Google Engineer and Professional App Developer
visible_instructors.title: Grant Klimaytys

items.headline: Complete Xamarin.Android Reference for Building Apps in C#. Threading, Images, Controls, Animations and Much More!
objectives_summary: Create fantastic and functional Android Apps
Understand common Android design patterns
Use graphics and animations

items.title: Twitter iOS Clone | Swift 5/Firebase | No Storyboards | MVVM
items.headline: Build a fully programmatic Twitter Clone for iOS 13 using Swift 5, Firebase and MVVM Architecture
objectives_summary: Build a Twitter clone with iOS 13, Swift 5 & Firebase without the use of storyboards
Use MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) Framework
Build a fully functioning social network

items.title: The Ultimate iOS 11 & Swift 4 Course. Learn to Build Apps!

visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students
visible_instructors.title: John Bura

items.headline: A Beginner's Guide to Xcode 9, Swift 4.0, ARKit, Core ML, SpriteKit, WatchKit, and more. Design AND code from scratch.
objectives_summary: Navigate Xcode 9's interface.
Make real apps from scratch.
Code in Apple's programming language, Swift 4.0.

items.title: Learn MVVM in Xamarin Forms and C#
items.headline: Build Xamarin Forms Application using Traditional MVVM & MVVM PRISM
objectives_summary: Be able to build xamarin forms apps with MVVM
Learn the complete fundamentals of MVVM and MVVM Prism
Create Quotes Application with MVVM Prism
